assistant_text: The wooden thing is a cutting board being used to chop vegetables and other ingredients.
It looks like there are broccoli, carrots, celery, green beans, and possibly some leafy greens on the cutting board.
The bottle with the cream cap appears to be a condiment or sauce, likely used to flavor the dish.
The main focus of this view is the group of zebras standing in a dry, wooded area.
The trees in the background are likely dry deciduous or thorn trees, commonly found in savanna regions.
